Loading observational dataÂ¶

This section of the documentation will introduce you to loading observational data into Bagpipes.

Loading data is done through a user-defined function allowing you to make the formatting of your data compatible with the formatting which Bagpipes requires. This function is called the data_load_func, learn how to write one here.

Detailed API documentation for the Galaxy class is available here.
